features: STYLISH DESIGN: Twin bed frame comes with an elegant headboard&footboard is designed for your bedroom/guest room. No matter what style your bedroom or guest room is, vintage, industrial or modern, this bed frame fits perfectly. (No mattress comes).
STRONG AND DURABLE: Heavy-duty bed frame is made of steel with ultimate strength, 12 metal bars for durability and stability. No box spring is needed. 330 lb weight capacity.
ENOUGH STORAGE SPACE: 12.5 Inches under bed clearance of double metal bed frame provides enough storage space for tidying your clothes, quilts, odds and ends.

EASY ASSEMBLY: The bed frame comes flat-packed in one box for easy to put together, which includes all parts, instructions and needed tools. Please follow the instruction and the assembly will be finished in half an hour. (Tools are included).
SURE TO SATISFY YOU: Platform bed frame dimension: 78 * 40 * 35 In. Feel free to email us if you have any questions.
body.description: Introducing the VECELO Metal Twin Bed Frame with Headboard and Footboard—a Perfect Blend of Style and FunctionalityQuality sleep starts with a proper bed! Robust and Long-Lasting : Crafted from premium-quality metal, this twin bed frame boasts stability and durability. Its dependable structure incorporates 13 sturdy metal slats, ensuring robust support and an undisturbed night's sleep. With a maximum weight capacity of 350 lbs, it offers both strength and comfort. No Box Spring Needed: Enjoy hassle-free assembly and a clean look without the need for a box spring. Twin Bed in One Box: Experience the convenience of receiving our twin bed frames in a single package, eliminating any extra waiting time. FREE Shipping and Supportive Service: Our twin bed frames are directly sold and shipped by Amazon, logistics timeliness is secured. Furthermore, we offer a hassle-free 30-day return window with no associated costs. Seamless Assembly: Simplifying the setup process, this metal twin bed frame is designed with slide-in slots and a folding construction, allowing for a swift and trouble-free assembly experience. Under-Bed Storage Solution: Elevate your storage possibilities with this 14-inch high platform twin bed frame, offering a generous 12.6 inches of clearance underneath. This ample space allows for the placement of storage boxes, effectively organizing your clothing or quilts.Specification:Twin Bed Material: Powder-Coated Metal Available Color: Black / White / Pink Max. Load ed Capacity : 350 lb Package Dimension: 42 x 13 x 3 in Bed Height: 14 inch Under Bed Clearance: 12 inch Recommended Mattress Thickness: 6-12 inch VECELO Notes:Please read the instruction carefully before the assembly mattress is not included ensure all parts and screws are firmly attached before use. If there's any problem with the products you received, please feel free to contact us to get free replacement parts.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Why Choose VECELO Twin Metal Bed Frames? Cute Headboard: Little heart design perfectly fits any bedroom style. 21-inch high headboard works well with mattresses of different thicknesses.Powder-Coated Surface: The metal surface with powder coating resists oxidation and scratches, durable for long-term use.Noise-free Design: Reinforced construction provides you with a quiet night.Under-bed Storage: There’s plenty of space under the bed for storage boxes - perfect for storing extra quilts and pillows.Sturdy Metal Frame: 12 metal slats for durability and stability. No box spring is needed.

New Upgraded Structure for Quick Assembly! In order to enable each customer to assemble twin bed frames quickly, we have simplified the installation steps after repeated experiments. We reduced the use of nuts and bolts as much as possible and makes the bed frame easier to install. In addition, we use a slot structure so that you can fix the slats to provide better support for the mattress. And, Packaging contains everything, just follow the instruction, and you will get the twin bed frame in a short time.

Frame Your Mattress An 8-12 inch mattress is recommended to perfectly showcase the cute headboard. Noise-free Design Twin metal bed frame features reinforced construction that can bear heavy weight about 330-440 lbs. Ample Storage Space A height clearance of about 12.5" under the bed provides enough space to suit your storage needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for price
reviews.reviewText: Super cute and dainty definitely worth the price. Pretty easy to assemble. I could do it by myself in about 45 minutes. Very good and simplistic for those on a budget

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid, Pretty Twin Bed Frame
reviews.reviewText: The frame is made out of a nice, subtly textured metal and painted black. I can tell it's hollow because 1) not exceedingly heavy and 2) it makes a nice sound when you tap on it. I ultimately chose this frame because of the elegant headboard, and it looks even nicer in person than it did online.I can't speak on how easy it was to assemble, since I wasn't the one to do it, but it's been a sturdy bed that hasn't creaked for me. I've also moved it around my room a few times (I like to reorganize), and even I (very weak), can easily push and pull it around. It also hasn't fallen apart or anything in the process, though one supporting bar on the bottom fell out. Putting it back in was a really simple and quick process.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love it!
reviews.reviewText: Easy to assemble and very sturdy! It’s the perfect height, not too low or too high. Great quality for a great price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute and very sturdy
reviews.reviewText: My friend girl's husband just put it together for me today. I'm 71 living with a chronic disease and several other health issues so I'm so very grateful for these two people in my life! I purchased this for my adult son living with a needs. The price was reasonable for a platform frame and I have not put a mattress on it yet because our staff is in storage in another State but he needs a new frame for his bed and I felt that a headboard would be nice, plus he seems to have issues with the basic bed frame for some reason, lol I have no idea why he's always adjusting his bed frames. I purchased the queen size because his mattress is queen size and only about 3 years old. I should have gotten him the full size because this size doesn't leave much space in his new bedroom since we just moved. This bed frame is very sturdy and not wobbly at all!! He did a great job putting it together!!! I love it and I don't think that when the mattress is on it and my son is sleeping on it that it will be any less sturdy. I just wish that I had gotten the full size and I would have saved some money if I had. I could had ended tables an a dresser if I hadn't been so for on his queen size mattress than I was trying to accommodate. Hopefully we will not have to move because it will have to be taken apart if I don't have movers that know how to put it on a truck without taking it apart. It might just have to be disconnected from the headboard and foot board and that would be the easiest way to move it. Anyway I don't think that you will be disappointed with the height or look of this!! I looked at the night stands on the sides of this bed frame in the picture and I wasn't sure if I'd like it but it definitely not disappointed in the quality for the price that I paid. I hope that the price doesn't increase because of good reviews. I'm on a tight income and we need quality and price too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to assemble, very cute, and good quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice n sturdy
reviews.reviewText: Bought for teenager. Sturdy and looks nice. Easy to put together

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very cute for the price
reviews.reviewText: I’m 50+ and put this together myself. Took me maybe 1.5 hrs? Would go much faster with more helping. The package with the parts was ripped open, so I had to sort things out before starting. Seems sturdy enough. We are just using it for a guest room. So far, happy with the purchase!I saw a review with a one star and a video. They are doing it wrong per the instructions. The instructions are quite clear and easy to follow. They are crewing things outward, but the screws go inward to the middle of the bed. Imagine screwing things outward, your leg would hit those outward screws and get banged up. Ouch!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This bed is cute but has many pieces and takes a while to put together. A full grown adult can sleep on on it. The bars in the base do not stay in well with just a mattress and the use of a box spring with a mattress would cover the headboard as it’s not very high, I suggest using a bunk bed box spring especially if your using an inexpensive or foam mattress.
Las patas tiene goma en el borde, es muy estable y fácil de armar, solo la arme en menos de 15 minutos el manual es fácil de ver y leer una vez le agarras el ritmo

Es muy fácil de armar, es sencilla pero resistente, ame esta compra, es difícil encontrar bases de cama con cabecera a buen precio y está lo vale. De pronto si solo inviertes en la pura base es difícil que después compres la cabecera y está te ahorra ese paso. Gran compra
